text: Ia oragh. Kɨ akar mogomer mamɨn gun ia mɨkɨmasa. En tarazi oveghan kogham. Me ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨma, sɨghar abuananam arangam, eghtɨ dughiar kamra God me damightɨ men nivafɨziba igharagh otogham. Bizir kam bar zuamɨram otogham, mati damazim komokoi moghɨn. Sɨgham arangamin dughiamɨn, ariaghreziba ua dɨkavighɨva uam ikuvan kogham. God bar moghɨra e damightɨ e nivafɨzir igharagha garibar otivam.
